segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 10
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 10

segments.pli: 5. Akkosavagga
segments.en: 5. Abuse

segments.pli: 47. Mahālisutta
segments.en: 47. With Mahāli

segments.pli: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
segments.en: At one time the Buddha was staying near Vesālī, at the Great Wood, in the hall with the peaked roof.

segments.pli: Atha kho mahāli licchavi yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho mahāli licchavi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
segments.en: Then Mahāli the Licchavi went up to the Buddha, bowed, sat down to one side, and said to him:

segments.pli: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo pāpassa kammassa kiriyāya pāpassa kammassa pavattiyā”ti?
segments.en: “What is the cause, sir, what is the reason for doing bad deeds, for performing bad deeds?”

segments.pli: “Lobho kho, mahāli, hetu, lobho paccayo pāpassa kammassa kiriyāya pāpassa kammassa pavattiyā.
segments.en: “Greed is a cause, Mahāli, greed is a reason for doing bad deeds, for performing bad deeds.

segments.pli: Doso kho, mahāli, hetu, doso paccayo pāpassa kammassa kiriyāya pāpassa kammassa pavattiyā.
segments.en: Hate is a cause of bad deeds …

segments.pli: Moho kho, mahāli, hetu, moho paccayo pāpassa kammassa kiriyāya pāpassa kammassa pavattiyā.
segments.en: Delusion is a cause of bad deeds …

segments.pli: Ayoniso manasikāro kho, mahāli, hetu, ayoniso manasikāro paccayo pāpassa kammassa kiriyāya pāpassa kammassa pavattiyā.
segments.en: Improper attention is a cause of bad deeds …

segments.pli: Micchāpaṇihitaṃ kho, mahāli, cittaṃ hetu, micchāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ paccayo pāpassa kammassa kiriyāya pāpassa kammassa pavattiyāti.
segments.en: A wrongly directed mind is a cause of bad deeds …

segments.pli: Ayaṃ kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo pāpassa kammassa kiriyāya pāpassa kammassa pavattiyā”ti.
segments.en: This is the cause, Mahāli, this is the reason for doing bad deeds, for performing bad deeds.”

segments.pli: “Ko pana, bhante, hetu ko paccayo kalyāṇassa kammassa kiriyāya kalyāṇassa kammassa pavattiyā”ti?
segments.en: “What is the cause, sir, what is the reason for doing good deeds, for performing good deeds?”

segments.pli: “Alobho kho, mahāli, hetu, alobho paccayo kalyāṇassa kammassa kiriyāya kalyāṇassa kammassa pavattiyā.
segments.en: “Contentment is a cause, Mahāli, contentment is a reason for doing good deeds, for performing good deeds.

segments.pli: Adoso kho, mahāli, hetu, adoso paccayo kalyāṇassa kammassa kiriyāya kalyāṇassa kammassa pavattiyā.
segments.en: Love is a cause of good deeds …

segments.pli: Amoho kho, mahāli, hetu, amoho paccayo kalyāṇassa kammassa kiriyāya kalyāṇassa kammassa pavattiyā.
segments.en: Understanding is a cause of good deeds …

segments.pli: Yoniso manasikāro kho, mahāli, hetu, yoniso manasikāro paccayo kalyāṇassa kammassa kiriyāya kalyāṇassa kammassa pavattiyā.
segments.en: Proper attention is a cause of good deeds …

segments.pli: Sammāpaṇihitaṃ kho, mahāli, cittaṃ hetu, sammāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ paccayo kalyāṇassa kammassa kiriyāya kalyāṇassa kammassa pavattiyā.
segments.en: A rightly directed mind is a cause of good deeds …

segments.pli: Ayaṃ kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo kalyāṇassa kammassa kiriyāya kalyāṇassa kammassa pavattiyā.
segments.en: This is the cause, Mahāli, this is the reason for doing good deeds, for performing good deeds.

segments.pli: Ime ca, mahāli, dasa dhammā loke na saṃvijjeyyuṃ, nayidha paññāyetha adhammacariyāvisamacariyāti vā dhammacariyāsamacariyāti vā.
segments.en: If these ten things were not found in the world, we wouldn’t see either unprincipled and immoral conduct, or principled and moral conduct.

segments.pli: Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, ime dasa dhammā loke saṃvijjanti, tasmā paññāyati adhammacariyāvisamacariyāti vā dhammacariyāsamacariyāti vā”ti.
segments.en: But since these ten things are found in the world, we see both unprincipled and immoral conduct, and principled and moral conduct.”

segments.pli: Sattamaṃ.
